price: 13.A-nabiyow sinaamak ixxic ; diggah anu inni Rabbih amri cinek kaxxa ayróh (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) digaalák meesita.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qul innī akhāfu in ʿaṣaytu rabbī ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
